modShortDescription: Changes blocks, loot and traders. Vending machines now restock every 7 days, but now broken vending machines can be smashed open.
modDescription:
Changes blocks, loot and [traders](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/). Vending machines now restock every 7 days, but now broken vending machines can be smashed open or have their locks picked for loot (food/drink/candy). Purses now also have a small chance to contain Candy.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1RCIP-8ojQdtBrsi_6at37EMd4yaro88X)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22900-sinicals-mods/).

**Credits:** [SiNiCaL](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/sinical/)
